content:
The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umerov, together with the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel-General Alexander Syrsky had a telephone conversation with the Minister of Defense of Norwegia Bjorka Arlled Gram.

About this the head of the Defense Office of Ukrainewroteon Facebook.

Rustem Umerov informed the Norwegian colleague about the situation at the front and urgent needs of Ukraine, in particular in artillery and air defense.

“They discussed ways of strengthening our dialogue, including expanding cooperation in the defense industry. He thanked Norway for the support of Ukraine, especially in the areas of air defense and maritime security, ”the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and the United StatesdiscussedIncreasing the capabilities of the Armed Forces.

.
title: The Minister of Defense and the Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forces had a conversation with the Minister of Defense of Norway: discussing
description: He wrote about it on Facebook. Rustem Umerov ...
author: Army Inform
